Sales Bulletins | July 2019
IntuVue Weather Radar Trade-In Program
- This bulletin announces a Trade-In offer to any Business Aviation Operator that purchases a RDR-4000 Weather Radar to replace their existing Honeywell Manufactured RDR-4A & -4B Weather Radar on Airbus and Boeing VVIP aircraft. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/j0LI0C2qQ000000ZXGT0E00]]>2019-39. <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-39%20RDR4000 Trade-In Promotion for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/JI2qQ00VCX0ZNE00G000000]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
DU-875 LCD Display Upgrades
- Maximize your customer’s options when deciding which DU-875 LCD display upgrade to choose when replacing or supporting DU-870 CRT displays on Primus 1000 / 2000 platforms. - This bulletin offers a new pricing and a discount on SmartRunway / SmartLanding - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-12 Rev B <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-12 DU-875 LCD Display Unit Upgrades for All Platforms REV B.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/JI2qQ00VCX0ZNE00G000000]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
